entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Expose `System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.GetTypeInfo` #90852
    Future
  • Fix source-gen issue with a binding member access expression being on a separate line from the member expression #90851
    8.0.0
  • Upgrade the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* version to use compiler interceptors for source gen #90849
    8.0.0
  • JIT test GenericCatchInterfaceProgram fails in Checked NativeAOT #90848
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Get the actual key from the Dictionary #90840
    Future
  • .NET runtime's method of loading Assemblies breaks Win32 LoadLibrary behavior #90839
  • Is there any way to remove DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader #90838
    9.0.0

Closed

  • create enough some daughtered enough some create.. #90853
  • High base memory usage with .NET 7 and 8 prev 7 #90843
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in config binder generator #89322
    8.0.0
  • BinderTracingTest_ResolutionFlow test fails #90593
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #90580
    8.0.0
  • CLR crashing when running RemoteExecutor tests locally on Debug builds #90485
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM AOT code is 1 to 1.5 orders of magnitude slower than native CLR #59816
    9.0.0
  • Using runtime built and dynamically-loaded dlls in Blazor Runtime causing issue in Kestrel hosting process. #76554
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] RuntimeTypeHandle.Equals seems to be broken in Release mode #90800
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Events for IL methods without IL headers #90844
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update Package readme guidelines with new template #90842
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90841
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Use symbol comparison in `CustomMarshallerAttributeAnalyzer` #90850
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Error out when NativeLib has EventPipe enabled #90811
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #90846
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix: function name typo #90845
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90835
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Events for IL methods without IL headers #90826
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90799
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90832
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mini] Fix typo in mono_decompose_vtype_opts #90825
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [WASM] Enable telemetry for WasmStripILAfterAOT #90827
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] HTTP & SSL Stress: Run nightlies against release/8.0 #90809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Add Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #90824
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove the minopts policy against cctors #90792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90819
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Change OneLocBuild mirror branch to release/8.0 #90813
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
